scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && pipenv run flask run --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5052 --debug
scripts.backend:prod: cd backend && export FLASK_ENV=production && pipenv run gunicorn --workers 4 --bind 0.0.0.0:5052 "app:create_app()"
scripts.sync-db: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:3316 && echo 'Tunnel connected, syncing DB...' && cd backend && pipenv run flask sync-db
scripts.prod: npm run build-frontend && npm run backend:prod
